class.name: VisualScript
class.brief_description: A script implemented in the Visual Script programming environment.
class.description: A script implemented in the Visual Script programming environment. The script extends the functionality of all objects that instance it. [method Object.set_script] extends an existing object, if that object's class matches one of the script's base classes. You are most likely to use this class via the Visual Script editor or when writing plugins for it.

method.name: add_custom_signal
method.description: Add a custom signal with the specified name to the VisualScript.

method.name: add_function
method.description: Add a function with the specified name to the VisualScript.

method.name: add_node
method.description: Add a node to a function of the VisualScript.

method.name: add_variable
method.description: Add a variable to the VisualScript, optionally giving it a default value or marking it as exported.

method.name: custom_signal_add_argument
method.description: Add an argument to a custom signal added with [method add_custom_signal].

method.name: custom_signal_get_argument_count
method.description: Get the count of a custom signal's arguments.

method.name: custom_signal_get_argument_name
method.description: Get the name of a custom signal's argument.

method.name: custom_signal_get_argument_type
method.description: Get the type of a custom signal's argument.

method.name: custom_signal_remove_argument
method.description: Remove a specific custom signal's argument.

method.name: custom_signal_set_argument_name
method.description: Rename a custom signal's argument.

method.name: custom_signal_set_argument_type
method.description: Change the type of a custom signal's argument.

method.name: custom_signal_swap_argument
method.description: Swap two of the arguments of a custom signal.

method.name: data_connect
method.description: Connect two data ports. The value of [code]from_node[/code]'s [code]from_port[/code] would be fed into [code]to_node[/code]'s [code]to_port[/code].

method.name: data_disconnect
method.description: Disconnect two data ports previously connected with [method data_connect].

method.name: get_function_node_id
method.description: Returns the id of a function's entry point node.

method.name: get_function_scroll
method.description: Returns the position of the center of the screen for a given function.

method.name: get_node
method.description: Returns a node given its id and its function.

method.name: get_node_position
method.description: Returns a node's position in pixels.

method.name: get_variable_default_value
method.description: Returns the default (initial) value of a variable.

method.name: get_variable_export
method.description: Returns whether a variable is exported.

method.name: get_variable_info
method.description: Returns the information for a given variable as a dictionary. The information includes its name, type, hint and usage.

method.name: has_custom_signal
method.description: Returns whether a signal exists with the specified name.

method.name: has_data_connection
method.description: Returns whether the specified data ports are connected.

method.name: has_function
method.description: Returns whether a function exists with the specified name.

method.name: has_node
method.description: Returns whether a node exists with the given id.

method.name: has_sequence_connection
method.description: Returns whether the specified sequence ports are connected.

method.name: has_variable
method.description: Returns whether a variable exists with the specified name.

method.name: remove_custom_signal
method.description: Remove a custom signal with the given name.

method.name: remove_function
method.description: Remove a specific function and its nodes from the script.

method.name: remove_node
method.description: Remove a specific node.

method.name: remove_variable
method.description: Remove a variable with the given name.

method.name: rename_custom_signal
method.description: Change the name of a custom signal.

method.name: rename_function
method.description: Change the name of a function.

method.name: rename_variable
method.description: Change the name of a variable.

method.name: sequence_connect
method.description: Connect two sequence ports. The execution will flow from of [code]from_node[/code]'s [code]from_output[/code] into [code]to_node[/code]. Unlike [method data_connect], there isn't a [code]to_port[/code], since the target node can have only one sequence port.

method.name: sequence_disconnect
method.description: Disconnect two sequence ports previously connected with [method sequence_connect].

method.name: set_function_scroll
method.description: Position the center of the screen for a function.

method.name: set_instance_base_type
method.description: Set the base type of the script.

method.name: set_node_position
method.description: Position a node on the screen.

method.name: set_variable_default_value
method.description: Change the default (initial) value of a variable.

method.name: set_variable_export
method.description: Change whether a variable is exported.

method.name: set_variable_info
method.description: Set a variable's info, using the same format as [method get_variable_info].

signal.name: node_ports_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the ports of a node are changed.
